summary: To impress a wealthy young woman, a clerk pretends he is a pro-golfer.
cast: William Haines|Joan Crawford|George K. Arthur|George Fawcett|Eileen Percy|Edward Earle|Bert Woodruff|Lee Moran|William A. Boardway|Helen Brent|Edward Brophy|Joseph Harrington|Jack Raymond|Ellinor Vanderveer|Florence Wix
title: Fiebre de primavera
